languages.text: Whenever {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} is killed, all enemies in a 10-cell radius around the prey have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} reduced by −<u>(5 × prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u> for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: При убийстве {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добычи{/g} все враги в радиусе 10 клеток от нее получают −<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранг{/g} добычи)</u> к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever prey is killed, all enemies in a 10-cell radius around the prey have their Agility reduced by -<u>5×(prey's difficulty tier)</u> for 2 rounds.

traits.locale_text: При убийстве добычи все враги в радиусе 10 клеток от нее получают −<u>(5 × уровень сложности добычи)</u> к Ловкости на 2 раунда.

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}猎物{/g}被击杀时，猎物周围10格内所有敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}都会降低<u>（5×猎物的{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}）</u>，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} is killed, all enemies in a 10-cell radius around the prey have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} reduced by −<u>(5 × prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u> for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当猎物被击杀时，猎物周围10格内所有敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}都会降低<u>（5×猎物的{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}）</u>，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: Cada vez que muera una {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}presa{/g}, todos los enemigos situados en un radio de 10 casillas alrededor de esa presa sufren una reducción de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} igual a −<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} de la presa)</u> durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} is killed, all enemies in a 10-cell radius around the prey have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} reduced by −<u>(5 × prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u> for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que muera una presa, todos los enemigos situados en un radio de 10 casillas alrededor de esa presa sufren una reducción de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} igual a −<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} de la presa)</u> durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.

languages.text: Immer wenn {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Beute{/g} getötet wird, wird die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} aller Gegner im Umkreis von 10 Feldern um die Beute für 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} um −<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsgrad{/g} der Beute)</u> reduziert.
languages.original_text: Whenever {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} is killed, all enemies in a 10-cell radius around the prey have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} reduced by −<u>(5 × prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u> for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn Beute getötet wird, wird die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} aller Gegner im Umkreis von 10 Feldern um die Beute für 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} um −<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsgrad{/g} der Beute)</u> reduziert.

languages.text: Lorsqu'une {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}proie{/g} est tuée, tous les ennemis situés dans un rayon de 10 cases autour de celle-ci subissent une réduction de -<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} de la proie)</u> de leur {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} is killed, all enemies in a 10-cell radius around the prey have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} reduced by −<u>(5 × prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u> for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'une proie est tuée, tous les ennemis situés dans un rayon de 10 cases autour de celle-ci subissent une réduction de -<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} de la proie)</u> de leur {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}獲物{/g}が倒された時、その獲物の周囲10セル以内にいるすべての敵は2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}が−<u>(5 × 獲物の{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}脅威度{/g})</u>される。
languages.original_text: Whenever {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} is killed, all enemies in a 10-cell radius around the prey have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} reduced by −<u>(5 × prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u> for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 獲物が倒された時、その獲物の周囲10セル以内にいるすべての敵は2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}が−<u>(5 × 獲物の{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}脅威度{/g})</u>される。
